# Snow Clearing, Snow Removal and Sanding Services Contract Opportunity

## Contract Details

- **Contract Title**: Snow Clearing, Snow Removal and Sanding Services
- **Contracting Agency**: Public Works and Government Services Canada
- **Contract Number**: W684E-22LP66/A
- **Solicitation Date**: 2022-09-27
- **Tender Closing Date**: 2022-10-25T15:00:00 EST (Closed)
- **Contract Duration**: 3 years with option to extend by 2 additional 1-year periods

## Background

The Department of National Defence (DND) Real Properties Operations Unit (West) Section Edmonton (RPOW Sect. Edm.) is seeking a contractor to provide snow clearing, snow removal and sanding services for the Garrison Edmonton area in Edmonton, Alberta. 

## Contract Requirements

The selected contractor must provide all necessary resources, equipment and personnel to clear snow from pre-defined and other areas within the Garrison Edmonton, including:

* Snow clearing services
* Snow removal services
* Sanding services
* Estimating, labor, equipment, materials, transportation and supervision

## Access to Documents and Tender

The contract opportunity is set forth in the following documents:

* Request for Proposal (RFP) No. W684E-22LP66/A 
* Part 2-Bidder Instructions
* Part 3-Bid Preparation Instructions

Prospective bidders are encouraged to carefully review the RFP documents and the Conditions of Contract. 

## Optional Site Visit and Bid Submission

An optional site visit has been planned. Please refer to the Part 2-Bidder Instructions for further details.

Bidders may submit their proposals electronically through the Canada Post Corporation’s CPC Connect service or via fax at (418) 566-6167. Hard copy bids will not be accepted.

## Conditional Reserved Bidding

Conditional reserved bidding under the Procurement Strategy for Indigenous Businesses (PSIB) will be conducted.

## Deadline and Eligibility

The tender closing date has passed. Eligible bidders may contact the contracting agency for more information.

## Trading Agreements

Canada trades under various agreements, including The Canada-European Union Comprehensive Economic and Trade Agreement (CETA), and The Canada-Colombia Free Trade Agreement, among others.
